columns.name: db_instance_identifier
columns.description: The friendly name to identify the DB Instance.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB Instance.

columns.name: db_cluster_identifier
columns.description: The friendly name to identify the DB cluster, that the DB instance is a member of.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Specifies the current state of this database.

columns.name: class
columns.description: Contains the name of the compute and memory capacity class of the DB instance.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.description: The AWS Region-unique, immutable identifier for the DB instance.

columns.name: allocated_storage
columns.description: Specifies the allocated storage size specified in gibibytes(GiB).

columns.name: auto_minor_version_upgrade
columns.description: Specifies whether minor version patches are applied automatically, or not.

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: Specifies the name of the Availability Zone the DB instance is located in.

columns.name: backup_retention_period
columns.description: Specifies the number of days for which automatic DB snapshots are retained.

columns.name: ca_certificate_identifier
columns.description: The identifier of the CA certificate for this DB instance.

columns.name: character_set_name
columns.description: Specifies the name of the character set that this instance is associated with.

columns.name: copy_tags_to_snapshot
columns.description: Specifies whether tags are copied from the DB instance to snapshots of the DB instance, or not.

columns.name: customer_owned_ip_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether a customer-owned IP address (CoIP) is enabled for an RDS on Outposts DB instance, or not.

columns.name: port
columns.description: Specifies the port that the DB instance listens on.

columns.name: db_name
columns.description: Contains the name of the initial database of this instance that was provided at create time.

columns.name: db_subnet_group_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB subnet group.

columns.name: db_subnet_group_description
columns.description: Provides the description of the DB subnet group.

columns.name: db_subnet_group_name
columns.description: The name of the DB subnet group.

columns.name: db_subnet_group_status
columns.description: Provides the status of the DB subnet group.

columns.name: deletion_protection
columns.description: Specifies whether the DB instance has deletion protection enabled, or not.

columns.name: endpoint_address
columns.description: Specifies the DNS address of the DB instance.

columns.name: endpoint_hosted_zone_id
columns.description: Specifies the ID that Amazon Route 53 assigns when you create a hosted zone.

columns.name: endpoint_port
columns.description: Specifies the port that the database engine is listening on.

columns.name: engine
columns.description: The name of the database engine to be used for this DB instance.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: Indicates the database engine version.

columns.name: enhanced_monitoring_resource_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the Amazon CloudWatch Logs log stream that receives the Enhanced Monitoring metrics data for the DB instance.

columns.name: iam_database_authentication_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether the the mapping of AWS IAM accounts to database accounts is enabled, or not.

columns.name: create_time
columns.description: Provides the date and time the DB instance was created.

columns.name: iops
columns.description: Specifies the Provisioned IOPS (I/O operations per second) value.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The AWS KMS key identifier for the encrypted DB instance.

columns.name: latest_restorable_time
columns.description: Specifies the latest time to which a database can be restored with point-in-time restore.

columns.name: license_model
columns.description: License model information for this DB instance.

columns.name: master_user_name
columns.description: Contains the master username for the DB instance.

columns.name: max_allocated_storage
columns.description: The upper limit to which Amazon RDS can automatically scale the storage of the DB instance.

columns.name: monitoring_interval
columns.description: The interval, in seconds, between points when Enhanced Monitoring metrics are collected for the DB instance.

columns.name: monitoring_role_arn
columns.description: The ARN for the IAM role that permits RDS to send Enhanced Monitoring metrics to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

columns.name: multi_az
columns.description: Specifies if the DB instance is a Multi-AZ deployment.

columns.name: nchar_character_set_name
columns.description: The name of the NCHAR character set for the Oracle DB instance.

columns.name: performance_insights_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether Performance Insights is enabled for the DB instance, or not.

columns.name: performance_insights_kms_key_id
columns.description: The AWS KMS key identifier for encryption of Performance Insights data.

columns.name: performance_insights_retention_period
columns.description: The amount of time, in days, to retain Performance Insights data.

columns.name: preferred_backup_window
columns.description: Specifies the daily time range during which automated backups are created.

columns.name: preferred_maintenance_window
columns.description: Specifies the weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur.

columns.name: promotion_tier
columns.description: Specifies the order in which an Aurora Replica is promoted to the primary instance after a failure of the existing primary instance.

columns.name: publicly_accessible
columns.description: Specifies the accessibility options for the DB instance.

columns.name: read_replica_source_db_instance_identifier
columns.description: Contains the identifier of the source DB instance if this DB instance is a read replica.

columns.name: replica_mode
columns.description: The mode of an Oracle read replica.

columns.name: secondary_availability_zone
columns.description: Specifies the name of the secondary Availability Zone for a DB instance with multi-AZ support.

columns.name: storage_encrypted
columns.description: Specifies whether the DB instance is encrypted, or not.

columns.name: storage_throughput
columns.description: Specifies the storage throughput for the DB instance. This setting applies only to the gp3 storage type.

columns.name: storage_type
columns.description: Specifies the storage type associated with DB instance.

columns.name: tde_credential_arn
columns.description: The ARN from the key store with which the instance is associated for TDE encryption.

columns.name: timezone
columns.description: The time zone of the DB instance.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: Provides the VpcId of the DB subnet group.

columns.name: associated_roles
columns.description: A list of AWS IAM roles that are associated with the DB instance.

columns.name: certificate
columns.description: The CA certificate associated with the DB instance.

columns.name: db_parameter_groups
columns.description: A list of DB parameter groups applied to this DB instance.

columns.name: db_security_groups
columns.description: A list of DB security group associated with the DB instance.

columns.name: domain_memberships
columns.description: A list of Active Directory Domain membership records associated with the DB instance.

columns.name: enabled_cloudwatch_logs_exports
columns.description: A list of log types that this DB instance is configured to export to CloudWatch Logs.

columns.name: option_group_memberships
columns.description: A list of option group memberships for this DB instance

columns.name: pending_maintenance_actions
columns.description: A list that provides details about the pending maintenance actions for the resource.

columns.name: processor_features
columns.description: The number of CPU cores and the number of threads per core for the DB instance class of the DB instance.

columns.name: read_replica_db_cluster_identifiers
columns.description: A list of identifiers of Aurora DB clusters to which the RDS DB instance is replicated as a read replica.

columns.name: read_replica_db_instance_identifiers
columns.description: A list of identifiers of the read replicas associated with this DB instance.

columns.name: status_infos
columns.description: The status of a read replica.

columns.name: subnets
columns.description: A list of subnet elements.

columns.name: vpc_security_groups
columns.description: A list of VPC security group elements that the DB instance belongs to.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags attached to the DB Instance.
